title: Finding Old Facebook Posts: Easy Search Tips

steps.title: Tap Menu in the Facebook app.
steps.content: Tap Menu in the Facebook app. It's at the top-right corner on an Android and the bottom-right on an iPhone or iPad. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap your name.
steps.content: Tap your name. You'll see it at the top of the screen. This takes you to your own profile .

steps.title: Tap the three-dots and select Activity Log.
steps.content: Tap the three-dots and select Activity Log . You'll see these dots next to the "Edit Profile" button.

steps.title: Tap Your Facebook activity.
steps.content: Tap Your Facebook activity . This displays lots of options you can search for.

steps.title: Tap Posts.
steps.content: Tap Posts . You may have to scroll down to see it.

steps.title: Choose which posts you want to find.
steps.content: Choose which posts you want to find. You can find your own posts (from your own timeline), your posts on other people's timelines, other people's posts on your timeline, and many other options.

steps.title: Tap the Filter icon and select Date.
steps.content: Tap the Filter icon and select Date . The filter icon is the two sliders at the top-left corner.

steps.title: Select a start and ending date.
steps.content: Select a start and ending date. You can find old posts between any two dates you'd like. You'll be able to choose both the month and year for both options.

steps.title: Tap Done or the checkmark to find old posts.
steps.content: Tap Done or the checkmark to find old posts. This displays all old Facebook posts that match your criteria.

steps.title: Click your profile photo at the top-right corner of Facebook.
steps.content: Click your profile photo at the top-right corner of Facebook. This opens the menu.

steps.title: Go to Settings and privacy > Settings.
steps.content: Go to Settings and privacy > Settings .

steps.title: Scroll down the left panel and click Activity log.
steps.content: Scroll down the left panel and click Activity log . It's toward the bottom of the left panel under the "Your activity" heading.

steps.title: Click Your Facebook activity.
steps.content: Click Your Facebook activity . This option is at the top of the left panel.

steps.title: Click Date and select a date.
steps.content: Click Date and select a date. "Date" is at the top-left corner under "Filters." You can choose the year and month you want to search (the month is optional). Once you've selected a date, click Save changes at the bottom.

steps.title: Click Posts.
steps.content: Click Posts . It's in the left panel below "Comments and reactions" under "Your activity across Facebook."

steps.title: Choose which old posts you want to find.
steps.content: Choose which old posts you want to find. You can find your own old posts (from your timeline), your posts on other people's timelines, other people's posts on your timeline, and more. Once you make a selection, all old Facebook posts that match your criteria will appear in the right panel.

steps.title: Tap the search icon.
steps.content: Tap the search icon. It's the magnifying glass at the top of the Facebook mobile app.

steps.title: Type a name or keyword into the Search field.
steps.content: Type a name or keyword into the Search field. This will allow you to search all people, posts, and photos. Don't press Enter or search just yet. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Search for (keyword).
steps.content: Tap Search for (keyword) . Choose this option at the bottom of the search results. If you don't see this option at the bottom of the suggested search terms, just tap the best matching search term in the list.

steps.title: Tap the Posts tab.
steps.content: Tap the Posts tab. It's at the top of the search results.

steps.title: Tap the Filter icon.
steps.content: Tap the Filter icon. It's the icon of two sliders at the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Date Posted and select a date.
steps.content: Tap Date Posted and select a date. You can choose to see old Facebook posts from any year.

steps.title: Tap Posts From to choose a Facebook user (optional).
steps.content: Tap Posts From to choose a Facebook user (optional). You can find old Facebook posts from You , Your friends , Your Groups and Pages , all Public posts , and Anyone on Facebook. Or, type the name of the person whose posts you want to view into the field and select them in the search results.

steps.title: Tap Show results.
steps.content: Tap Show results . This displays old Facebook posts that match your search parameters.

steps.title: Click the Search field.
steps.content: Click the Search field. It's at the top of Facebook.

steps.title: Type a name or keyword into the Search field and press ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Type a name or keyword into the Search field and press ↵ Enter . This will allow you to search people, posts, and photos. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Posts tab.
steps.content: Click the Posts tab. It's on the left panel. This filters your search to show posts that contain what you've typed.

steps.title: Click Date Posted and select a date.
steps.content: Click Date Posted and select a date. Select the year you'd like to search for from the menu.

steps.title: Click Posts From to choose a Facebook user (optional).
steps.content: Click Posts From to choose a Facebook user (optional). To search for posts from a specific person, start typing their name into the "Choose Source" field, then select them from the results. Alternatively, you can select Anyone (all posts, including those from people you follow), You (to search for your own old posts), Your friends , Your Groups and Pages , or Public posts (all public posts). Once you select an option, the search results will update to show only the old posts you requested.

steps.title: Go to any Facebook profile on a computer.
steps.content: Go to any Facebook profile on a computer. If you're using Facebook in a web browser on your computer, you can use the Filters feature on any profile (including your own) to see old Facebook posts. The Filters feature is not available in the Facebook mobile app.

steps.title: Click the Filters button.
steps.content: Click the Filters button. You'll see this on the right side of the page next to "Posts" just above the first post on the profile. You can also search someone's old posts by clicking the three dots ••• at the upper-right corner of their profile and choosing Search .

steps.title: Select a date and click Done.
steps.content: Select a date and click Done . You can choose any year and month in the past to view old posts from that year.
